You know how much I value our relationship and how important it is to us both. Criticizing my friends or intimidating me would only cause unnecessary tension and conflict. Humiliating me would be absolutely devastating, and I couldn't bear the thought of it.

But on the other hand, supporting me to share my ideas and being receptive to my thoughts is so important for our growth as a couple. It's essential that we create a safe space for each other to express ourselves openly and honestly. And when we do, I can't help but feel enthusiastic to see you and listen carefully to your every word.

So let's focus on the positive aspects of our relationship and work together to build a strong, loving bond that will carry us through any challenges we may face.
